name: Range: Close
description: Abilities that are used in close combat.

name: Range: Mid
description: Abilities that are used in mid-range combat.

name: Range: Long
description: Abilities that are used in long-range combat.

name: Role: Offense
description: Abilities that are used to attack enemies.

name: Role: Defense
description: Abilities that are used to protect the user and allies.

name: Role: Support
description: Abilities that are used to help allies.

name: Power Level: 1
description: Lowest level of power. On level with a particularly athletic non-powered human.

name: Power Level: 2
description: Medium level of power. On level with minor superhuman abilities.

name: Power Level: 3
description: High level of power. On level with the average superhuman ability.

name: Power Level: 4
description: Very high level of power. On level with major superhuman abilities.

name: Power Level: 5
description: Highest level of power. On level with planet-destroying threats.

name: Pattern: Single Target
description: Abilities that affect a single target.

name: Pattern: Area
description: Abilities that affect an area.

name: Pattern: Cone
description: Abilities that affect a cone-shaped area.

name: Pattern: Beam
description: Abilities that affect a straight line.

name: Pattern: Burst
description: Abilities that affect a circular area around the user.

name: Pattern: Ball
description: Abilities that affect a spherical area. Typically ranged.

name: Element Type: Divine
description: Elements that exist in a realm wholly outside of human understanding.

name: Element Type: Natural
description: Elements that are commonly found in nature.

name: Element Type: Organic
description: Elements that deal with life and living things.

name: Element Type: Scientific
description: Elements commonly associated with science and technology.

name: Element Type: Skill
description: No power, though possibly nearing superhuman aptitude in a natural ability.

name: Element: Dark
description: Of or relating to shadows, darkness, and similar concepts.

name: Element: Energy
description: Of or relating to energy itself.

name: Element: Fate
description: Of or relating to luck, misfortune, and similar concepts.

name: Element: Light
description: Of or relating to light, illumination, and similar concepts.

name: Element: Air
description: Of or relating to wind, the atmosphere, and similar concepts.

name: Element: Earth
description: Of or relating to plants, rocks, and similar concepts.

name: Element: Fire
description: Of or relating to flame, heat, and similar concepts.

name: Element: Ice
description: Of or relating to freezing, cold, and similar concepts.

name: Element: Water
description: Of or relating to rain, oceans, and similar concepts.

name: Element: Body
description: Of or relating to human or animal bodies.

name: Element: Death
description: Of or relating to dying, decay, and similar concepts.

name: Element: Life
description: Of or relating to life and living things.

name: Element: Love
description: Of or relating to emotions, beliefs, and similar concepts.

name: Element: Venom
description: Of or relating to poisons, toxins, and similar concepts.

name: Element: Electric
description: Of or relating to lightning, electricity, and similar concepts.

name: Element: Gravity
description: Of or relating to gravitational forces.

name: Element: Nuclear
description: Of or relating to nuclear reactions.

name: Element: Psionic
description: Of or relating to psychic abilities.

name: Element: Sound
description: Of or relating to noise.

name: Element: Space
description: Of or relating to distance and space itself.

name: Element: Time
description: Of or relating to the passage of time itself.

name: Effect: Accurate
description: Will hit the intended target with a high degree of accuracy.

name: Effect: Explosive
description: Will hit the intended target and the surrounding area.

name: Effect: Homing
description: Will follow the intended target until it hits.

name: Effect: Incendiary
description: Will cause a fire upon impact.

name: Effect: Piercing
description: Will hit the intended target through cover and armor.

name: Effect: Radiation
description: Will cause radiation poisoning upon impact.

name: Effect: Ricochet
description: Will bounce off surfaces at least once before activating.
